Categories.ChineseCategoryName: 复制、粘贴及其他常规的键盘快捷方式
Categories.EnglishCategoryName: Copy, paste, and other general keyboard shortcuts

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 剪切选定项
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Cut the selected item

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 复制选定项
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Copy the selected item

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 粘贴选定项
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Paste the selected item

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 撤消操作
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Undo an action

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 在打开的应用之间切换
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Switch between open apps

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 关闭活动项，或者退出活动应用
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Close the active item, or exit the active app

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 重命名所选项目
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Rename the selected item

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 在文件资源管理器中搜索文件或文件夹
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Search for a file or folder in File Explorer

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 在文件资源管理器中显示地址栏列表
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Display the address bar list in File Explorer

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 刷新活动窗口
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Refresh the active window

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 循环浏览窗口中或桌面上的屏幕元素
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Cycle through screen elements in a window or on the desktop

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 激活活动应用中的菜单栏
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Activate the Menu bar in the active app

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 在登录屏幕上显示你的密码
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Show your password on the sign-in screen

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 按项目打开顺序循环浏览
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Cycle through items in the order in which they were opened

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 执行该字母相关的命令
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Perform the command for that letter

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 显示所选项目的属性
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Display properties for the selected item

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开活动窗口的快捷菜单
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open the shortcut menu for the active window

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 返回
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Go back

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 前进
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Go forward

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 向上移动一个屏幕
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Move up one screen

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 向下移动一个屏幕
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Move down one screen

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 关闭活动文档
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Close the active document

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 选择文档或窗口中的所有项目
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Select all items in a document or window

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 删除选定项，将其移至回收站
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Delete the selected item and move it to the Recycle Bin

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开搜索
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open Search

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 刷新活动窗口
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Refresh the active window

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 恢复操作
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Redo an action

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将光标移动到下一个字词的起始处
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Move the cursor to the beginning of the next word

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将光标移动到上一个字词的起始处
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Move the cursor to the beginning of the previous word

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将光标移动到下一段落的起始处
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Move the cursor to the beginning of the next paragraph

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将光标移动到上一段落的起始处
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Move the cursor to the beginning of the previous paragraph

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 使用箭头键在所有打开的应用之间进行切换
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Use the arrow keys to switch between all open apps

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 当组或磁贴的焦点放在“开始”菜单上时，可将其朝指定方向移动
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: When a group or tile is in focus on the Start menu, move it in the direction specified

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 当磁贴的焦点放在“开始”菜单上时，将其移到另一个磁贴即可创建一个文件夹
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: When a tile is in focus on the Start menu, move it into another tile to create a folder

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开“开始”菜单后调整其大小
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Resize the Start menu when it's open

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 选择窗口中或桌面上的多个单独项目
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Select multiple individual items in a window or on the desktop

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开“开始”菜单
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open Start

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开任务管理器
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open Task Manager

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 如果多种键盘布局可用，则可切换键盘布局
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Switch the keyboard layout when multiple keyboard layouts are available

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开或关闭中文输入法编辑器
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Turn the Chinese input method editor (IME) on or off.

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 显示选定项的快捷菜单
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Display the shortcut menu for the selected item

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 在窗口中或桌面上选择多个项目，或在文档中选择文本
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Select more than one item in a window or on the desktop, or select text in a document.

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 删除选定项，无需先移动到回收站
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Delete the selected item without moving it to the Recycle Bin first

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开右侧的下一个菜单，或打开子菜单
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open the next menu to the right, or open a submenu

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开左侧的下一个菜单，或关闭子菜单
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open the next menu to the left, or close a submenu

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 停止或离开当前任务
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Stop or leave the current task

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 捕获整个屏幕的屏幕截图并将其复制到剪贴板
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Take a screenshot of your whole screen and copy it to the clipboard

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开或关闭“开始”菜单
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open or close Start

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开快速设置
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open Quick Settings

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将焦点设置为任务栏角落的第一个图标
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Set focus to the first icon in the Taskbar corner

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 从 Microsoft Teams 打开聊天
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open Chat from Microsoft Teams

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开超级按钮菜单
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open the charms menu

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开颜色筛选器
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Turn on color filters

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 显示和隐藏桌面
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Display and hide the desktop

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开文件资源管理器
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open File Explorer

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开反馈中心并获取屏幕截图
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open Feedback Hub and take a screenshot

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开 Xbox Game Bar
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open Xbox Game Bar when a game is open

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开或关闭 HDR
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Turn HDR on or off

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 启动语音键入
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Launch voice typing

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开设置
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open Settings

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 请将焦点设置到可用的 Windows 提示
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Set focus to a Windows tip when one is available

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 从“快速设置”打开“投放”
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open Cast from Quick Settings

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 锁定你的电脑或切换帐户
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Lock your PC

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 最小化所有窗口
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Minimize all windows

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 还原桌面上的最小化窗口
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Restore minimized windows on the desktop

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开通知中心和日历
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open notification center and calendar

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 锁定设备方向
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Lock device orientation

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 选择演示显示模式
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Choose a presentation display mode

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开快速助手
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open Quick Assist

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开“运行”对话框
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open the Run dialog box

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 在焦点中录制游戏窗口的视频
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Record video of game window in focus

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开搜素
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open search

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 获取部分屏幕的屏幕截图
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Take a screenshot of part of your screen

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 循环浏览任务栏上的应用
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Cycle through apps on the taskbar

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开辅助功能设置
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open Accessibility Settings

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开剪贴板历史记录
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open the clipboard history

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将焦点设置到通知
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Set focus to a notification

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开小组件
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open Widgets

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开“快速链接”菜单
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open the Quick Link menu

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 在 Windows Mixed Reality 与桌面之间切换输入
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Switch input between Windows Mixed Reality and your desktop

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开对齐布局
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open the snap layouts

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开表情符号面板
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open emoji panel

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 临时速览桌面
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Temporarily peek at the desktop

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开设置 > 系统 > 关于
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Opens Settings > System  > About

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 搜索电脑
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Search for PCs

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开桌面，然后启动固定到任务栏的应用
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open the desktop and start the app pinned to the taskbar

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开桌面，然后启动固定到任务栏的应用新实例
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open the desktop and start a new instance of the app pinned to the taskbar

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开桌面，然后打开固定到任务栏的应用的“跳转列表”
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open the desktop and open the Jump List for the app pinned to the taskbar

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开任务视图
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open Task view

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 最大化窗口
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Maximize the window

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将焦点中的窗口贴靠到屏幕的上半部分
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Snap window in focus to top half of screen

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 删除屏幕上的当前应用并最小化桌面窗口
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Remove current app from screen or minimize the desktop window

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将焦点窗口贴靠到屏幕下半部分
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Snap window in focus to bottom half of screen

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 最大化屏幕左侧的应用或桌面窗口
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Maximize the app or desktop window to the left side of the screen

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 最大化屏幕右侧的应用或桌面窗口
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Maximize the app or desktop window to the right side of the screen

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 最小化活动桌面窗口之外的所有窗口
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Minimize all except the active desktop window

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将桌面窗口拉伸至屏幕顶部和底部
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Stretch the desktop window to the top and bottom of the screen

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 在垂直方向上还原/最小化活动桌面窗口，而宽度保持不变
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Restore/minimize active desktop windows vertically, maintaining width

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将桌面上的应用或窗口从一台显示器移动至另一台显示器
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Move an app or window in the desktop from one monitor to another

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 在语言和键盘布局中向后循环
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Cycle backwards through language and keyboard layout

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 切换输入语言和键盘布局
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Switch input language and keyboard layout

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 对之前选择的输入所做的更改
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Change to a previously selected input

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开“讲述人”
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Turn on Narrator

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开放大镜并放大
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open Magnifier and zoom in

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 缩小放大镜
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Zoom out in Magnifier

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 关闭放大镜
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Close Magnifier

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 开始输入法复原流程
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Begin IME reconversion

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 从空白或黑屏唤醒电脑
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Wake PC from blank or black screen

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将全屏屏幕截图保存到文件
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Save full screen screenshot to file

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将焦点中的游戏窗口的屏幕截图保存到文件
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Save screenshot of game window in focus to file
